com.groupdocs.conversion.options.convert

Interface IPageRangedConvertOptions

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IConvertOptions
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    com.groupdocs.conversion.options.convert.CommonConvertOptions, ImageConvertOptions, MarkupConvertOptions, PdfConvertOptions, PresentationConvertOptions, SpreadsheetConvertOptions, WordProcessingConvertOptions

    public interface IPageRangedConvertOptions
extends IConvertOptions
    Represents convert options that support conversion of specific list of pages

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Integer> getPages()
      Gets The list of page indexes to be converted.
      void setPages(List<Integer> pages)
      Sets the list of page indexes to be converted.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.groupdocs.conversion.options.convert.IConvertOptions

        getFormat, setFormat

    • Method Detail

      • getPages

        List<Integer> getPages()
        Gets The list of page indexes to be converted. Should be specified to convert specific pages.
        Returns:
        The list of page indexes to be converted. Should be specified to convert specific pages.

      • setPages

        void setPages(List<Integer> pages)
        Sets the list of page indexes to be converted. Should be specified to convert specific pages.
        Parameters:
        pages - The list of page indexes to be converted. Should be specified to convert specific pages.
